annotations.org.opencontainers.image.description: App is an application that does things.
annotations.org.opencontainers.image.ref.name: App
annotations.org.opencontainers.image.title: App Thing Doer

annotations.description: This property contains arbitrary metadata. Property MUST use the annotation rules.

config.description: A descriptor for referencing a blob.

annotations.description: This property contains arbitrary metadata. Property MUST use the annotation rules.

digest.description: the cryptographic checksum digest of the object, in the pattern `<algorithm>:<encoded>`

size.description: This REQUIRED property specifies the size, in bytes, of the raw content. This property exists so that a client will have an expected size for the content before processing. If the length of the retrieved content does not match the specified length, the content SHOULD NOT be trusted.

urls.description: A list of URLs from which the content may be downloaded.

config.title: OCI Content Descriptor

layers.description: Each item in the array MUST be a descriptor. The array MUST have the base layer at index 0. Subsequent layers MUST then follow in stack order (i.e. from layers[0] to layers[len(layers)-1]). The final filesystem layout MUST match the result of applying the layers to an empty directory. The ownership, mode, and other attributes of the initial empty directory are unspecified.

items.description: A descriptor for referencing a blob.

annotations.description: This property contains arbitrary metadata. Property MUST use the annotation rules.

digest.description: the cryptographic checksum digest of the object, in the pattern `<algorithm>:<encoded>`

size.description: This REQUIRED property specifies the size, in bytes, of the raw content. This property exists so that a client will have an expected size for the content before processing. If the length of the retrieved content does not match the specified length, the content SHOULD NOT be trusted.

urls.description: A list of URLs from which the content may be downloaded.

items.title: OCI Content Descriptor

schemaVersion.description: This REQUIRED property specifies the schema version. For this version ofthe specification, this MUST be `2` to ensure backward compatibility with older versions of Docker. The value of this field will not change.

annotations.description: This property contains arbitrary metadata. Property MUST use the annotation rules.

manifests.description: This REQUIRED property contains a list of manifests for specific platforms. While this property MUST be present, the size of the array MAY be zero

items.description: A descriptor for referencing a blob.

annotations.description: This property contains arbitrary metadata. Property MUST use the annotation rules.

digest.description: the cryptographic checksum digest of the object, in the pattern `<algorithm>:<encoded>`

architecture.description: This REQUIRED property specifies the CPU architecture. Image indexes SHOULD use, and implementations SHOULD understand, values listed in the Go Language document for `GOARCH`

features.description: This property is RESERVED for future versions of the specification.

os.description: The name of the operating system which the image is built to run on. Configurations SHOULD use, and implementations SHOULD understand, values listed in the Go Language document for `GOOS`.

os.features.description: This OPTIONAL property specifies an array of strings, each specifying a mandatory OS feature.

os.version.description: This OPTIONAL property specifies the version of the operating system targeted by th referenced blob. Implementations MAY refuse to use manifests where os.version is not known to work with the host OS version. Valid values are implementation-defined. eg. `10.0.14393.1066` on windows.

variant.description: This OPTIONAL property specifies the variant of the CPU.

size.description: This REQUIRED property specifies the size, in bytes, of the raw content. This property exists so that a client will have an expected size for the content before processing. If the length of the retrieved content does not match the specified length, the content SHOULD NOT be trusted.

urls.description: A list of URLs from which the content may be downloaded.

items.title: OCI Content Descriptor

schemaVersion.description: This REQUIRED property specifies the schema version. For this version ofthe specification, this MUST be `2` to ensure backward compatibility with older versions of Docker. The value of this field will not change.

Content-Length.description: The byte length of the data returned.

Content-Type.description: The MIME type of the data.

Date.description: The date and time the message was originated.

Docker-Content-Digest.description: Includes the digest of the target entity returned in the response. Clients can use this header to verify the integrity of downloaded content

layers.description: Each item in the array MUST be a descriptor. The array MUST have the base layer at index 0. Subsequent layers MUST then follow in stack order (i.e. from layers[0] to layers[len(layers)-1]). The final filesystem layout MUST match the result of applying the layers to an empty directory. The ownership, mode, and other attributes of the initial empty directory are unspecified.

items.description: A descriptor for referencing a blob.

annotations.description: This property contains arbitrary metadata. Property MUST use the annotation rules.

digest.description: the cryptographic checksum digest of the object, in the pattern `<algorithm>:<encoded>`

size.description: This REQUIRED property specifies the size, in bytes, of the raw content. This property exists so that a client will have an expected size for the content before processing. If the length of the retrieved content does not match the specified length, the content SHOULD NOT be trusted.

urls.description: A list of URLs from which the content may be downloaded.

items.title: OCI Content Descriptor

schemaVersion.description: This REQUIRED property specifies the schema version. For this version ofthe specification, this MUST be `2` to ensure backward compatibility with older versions of Docker. The value of this field will not change.

Content-Length.description: The byte length of the data returned.

Content-Type.description: The MIME type of the data.

Date.description: The date and time the message was originated.

schema.description: This property contains a list of errors messages returned from the server due to an invalid request.
schema.title: OCI Error Response

Content-Length.description: The byte length of the data returned.

Content-Type.description: The MIME type of the data.

Date.description: The date and time the message was originated.

WWW-Authenticate.description: Defines the authentication method that should be used to gain access to a resource.
